TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit RectangleF extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 儲存四個為一組的浮點數值 (Floating-Point Number)，表示矩形的位置和大小。

span.span: Stores a set of four floating-point numbers that represent the location and size of a rectangle.

summary.span: 如需更多進階的區域函式，請使用 物件。

span.span: For more advanced region functions, use a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 矩形均其寬度、 高度和左上角。A rectangle is defined by its width, height, and upper-left corner.

summary.span: 使用指定的位置和大小，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified location and size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法來放大這個矩形，而不是它的複本。This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it. 矩形變大時雙向沿座標軸。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形在 x 軸的 50 膨脹，產生的矩形將 150 單位長 （原始 50、 負方向 50 和方向會加上 50） 維護矩形的幾何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is inflated by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. ## Examples 這個範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要e，OnPaint 事件物件的物件。This example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires e, an OnPaint event object. 程式碼會建立並將它繪製成黑色畫面。The code creates a and draws it to the screen in black. 請注意，它必須轉換成繪製用途。Notice that it has to be converted to a for drawing purposes. 然後程式碼來放大，再轉換成，並將它繪製以紅色螢幕。Then the code enlarges the , again converts it to a , and draws it to the screen in red. 請注意，原始 （黑色） 的矩形，會根據 100 點沿著 x 軸雙向展開。Notice that the original (black) rectangle is expanded in both directions along the x-axis by 100 points. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法來放大這個矩形，而不是它的複本。This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it. 矩形變大時雙向沿座標軸。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形在 x 軸的 50 膨脹，產生的矩形將 150 單位長 （原始 50、 負方向 50 和方向會加上 50） 維護矩形的幾何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is inflated by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. 如果有任一個`x`或`y`是負數，縮小對應方向。If either `x` or `y` is negative, the is deflated in the corresponding direction.

The enlarged .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立一份`rect`、 放大複本，然後傳回 放大的複本。This method makes a copy of `rect`, enlarges the copy, and then returns the enlarged copy. 矩形變大時雙向沿座標軸。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形在 x 軸的 50 膨脹，產生的矩形將 150 單位長 （原始 50、 負方向 50 和方向會加上 50） 維護矩形的幾何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is inflated by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center.

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。This example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 程式碼會建立兩個物件，並將它們繪製至黑色 和 紅色 畫面。The code creates two objects and draws them to the screen in black and red. 請注意，他們必須轉換成繪製用途的物件。Notice that they have to be converted to objects for drawing purposes. 然後程式碼建立第三個使用方法，轉換成，並將它繪製以藍色畫面。Then the code creates a third using the method, converts it to a , and draws it to the screen in blue. 請注意，第三個 （藍色） 的矩形是重疊的兩個矩形的區域：Notice the third (blue) rectangle is the area of overlap of the other two rectangles: [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

param.name: a
param.span: 要聯集的矩形。

span.span: A rectangle to union.

param.name: b
param.span: 要聯集的矩形。

span.span: A rectangle to union.

summary.span: 建立最小可能的第三個矩形，這個矩形包含形成聯集的兩個矩形。

span.span: Creates the smallest possible third rectangle that can contain both of two rectangles that form a union.

returns.span: 第三個 結構，包含形成聯集的兩個矩形。

span.span: A third structure that contains both of the two rectangles that form the union.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當兩個矩形的其中一個是空的這表示所有的值零，方法會傳回起點的矩形 （0，0） 高度和非空白矩形的寬度。When one of the two rectangles is empty, meaning all of its values are zero, the method returns a rectangle with a starting point of (0, 0), and the height and width of the non-empty rectangle. 例如，如果您有兩個矩形的 = （0，0，則為 0，0） 和 B = （1，1，2，2），然後 A 的聯集，而 B 是 （0，0，則為 2，2）。For example, if you have two rectangles A = (0, 0; 0, 0) and B = (1, 1; 2, 2), then the union of A and B is (0, 0; 2, 2). ## Examples 這個範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要e事件物件。This example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires e, an event object. 程式碼會建立兩個s，並將它們繪製至黑色 和 紅色 畫面。The code creates two s and draws them to the screen in black and red. 請注意，他們必須轉換成s 繪製用途。Notice that they have to be converted to s for drawing purposes. 然後程式碼建立第三個使用方法，轉換成，並將它繪製以藍色畫面。Then the code creates a third using the method, converts it to a , and draws it to the screen in blue. 請注意，第三個 （藍色） 的矩形可以包含其他兩個矩形的最小可能矩形：Notice the third (blue) rectangle is the smallest possible rectangle that can contain both of the other two rectangles: [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleFExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]
